AUSTRALIA: The Australian health authority is the [Department of Health](https://www.health.gov.au/news/health-alerts/novel-coronavirus-2019-ncov-health-alert).
AUSTRIA: The Austrian health authority is the [National Institute of Health](https://goeg.at/english): [Gesundheit Österreich GmbH](https://goeg.at).
BAHRAIN: The Bahraini health authority is the [National Health Regulatory Authority](https://www.nhra.bh/Media/Announcement/General%20Announcement%2001.aspx): [الهيئة الوطنية لتنظيم المهن والخدمات الصحية](https://www.nhra.bh/ar/Media/Announcement/General%20Announcement%2001.aspx).
BELGIUM: The Belgian health authority is: [Federal Public Service Health](https://www.info-coronavirus.be/en/): [Veiligheid van de Voedselketen en Leefmilieu](https://www.info-coronavirus.be/nl/), [Sécurité de la Chaîne alimentaire et Environnement](https://www.info-coronavirus.be/fr/).
BRAZIL: The Brazilian health authority is the [Oswaldo Cruz Foundation](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=pt&u=https://portal.fiocruz.br/coronavirus-2019-ncov-informacoes-para-pesquisadores): [Fundação Oswaldo Cruz](https://portal.fiocruz.br/coronavirus).
CHINA: The Chinese health authority is the [National Health Commission](http://en.nhc.gov.cn/antivirusfight.html): [国家卫生健康委员会](http://www.nhc.gov.cn/jkj/new_index.shtml).
CZECHIA: The Czech health authority is the [National Institute of Public Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=cs&u=http://www.szu.cz/tema/prevence/2019ncov&prev=search): [Státní zdravotní ústav](http://www.szu.cz/tema/prevence/2019ncov).
DIAMOND PRINCESS: Health information can be found on [Princess Cruises' website.](https://www.princess.com/news/notices_and_advisories/notices/coronavirus-update.html).
EGYPT: The Egyptian health authority is the [Ministry of Health and Population](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ne&u=http://mohp.gov.np): [وزارة الصحة والسكان](http://www.mohp.gov.eg/).
ESTONIA: The Estonian health authority is the [Health Board](https://www.terviseamet.ee/en/covid19): [Terviseamet](https://www.terviseamet.ee/et/koroonaviiruse-haigus-covid-19).
FINLAND: The Finnish health authority is the [National Institute for Health and Welfare](https://thl.fi/en/web/infectious-diseases/what-s-new/coronavirus-covid-19-latest-updates): [Terveyden ja hyvinvoinnin laitos](https://thl.fi/fi/web/infektiotaudit-ja-rokotukset/ajankohtaista/ajankohtaista-koronaviruksesta-covid-19).
FRANCE: The French health authority is [Public Health France](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=fr&u=https://www.santepubliquefrance.fr/maladies-et-traumatismes/maladies-et-infections-respiratoires/infection-a-coronavirus/articles/infection-au-nouveau-coronavirus-sars-cov-2-covid-19-france-et-monde): [Santé Publique France](https://www.santepubliquefrance.fr/maladies-et-traumatismes/maladies-et-infections-respiratoires/infection-a-coronavirus/articles/infection-au-nouveau-coronavirus-sars-cov-2-covid-19-france-et-monde).
GERMANY: The German health authority is the [Federal Ministry of Health](https://www.bundesgesundheitsministerium.de/en/press/2020/coronavirus.html#c17363): [Bundesministerium für Gesundheit](https://www.bundesgesundheitsministerium.de/coronavirus.html).
GREECE: The Greek health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=el&u=https://www.moh.gov.gr/articles/health/dieythynsh-dhmosias-ygieinhs/metadotika-kai-mh-metadotika-noshmata/c388-egkyklioi/6652-odhgies-prostasias-apo-anapneystikh-loimwksh-apo-to-neo-koronaio&prev=search): [Υπουργείο Υγείας](https://www.moh.gov.gr/articles/health/dieythynsh-dhmosias-ygieinhs/metadotika-kai-mh-metadotika-noshmata/c388-egkyklioi/6652-odhgies-prostasias-apo-anapneystikh-loimwksh-apo-to-neo-koronaio).
HONG KONG: The Hong Kongese health authority is the [Department of Health](https://www.coronavirus.gov.hk/eng/index.html): [衞生署](https://www.coronavirus.gov.hk/sim/index.html).
ICELAND: The Icelandic health authority is the [Directorate of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=is&tl=en&u=www.covid.is): [Embætti landlæknis](https://www.covid.is).
INDIA: The Indian health authority is the [National Institute of Health & Family Welfare](http://www.nihfw.org): [राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य और परिवार कल्याण संस्थान](http://www.nihfw.org/indexH.aspx).
INDONESIA: The Indonesian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=id&u=https://infeksiemerging.kemkes.go.id): [Kementerian Kesehatan](https://infeksiemerging.kemkes.go.id/).
IRAN: The Iranian health authority is the [Institute of Public Health Research](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=fa&u=http://nihr.tums.ac.ir/Item/672): [انستیتوی ملی تحقیقات بهداشت عمومی](http://nihr.tums.ac.ir/Item/672).
IRAQ: The Iraqi health authority is the [Ministry of Health and environment](https://gds.gov.iq/novel-coronavirus/): [وزارة الصحة والبيئة](https://gds.gov.iq/ar/novel-coronavirus/).
IRELAND: The Irish health authority is the [Department of Health](https://www.gov.ie/en/campaigns/c36c85-covid-19-coronavirus/): [An Roinn Sláinte](https://www.gov.ie/ga/feachtais/37ce61-none/).
ISRAEL: The Israeli health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://www.health.gov.il/English/Topics/Diseases/corona/Pages/default.aspx): [משרד הבריאות](https://www.health.gov.il/Subjects/disease/corona/Pages/default.aspx).
ITALY: The Italian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=it&u=http://www.salute.gov.it/portale/nuovocoronavirus/dettaglioContenutiNuovoCoronavirus.jsp%3Flingua%3Ditaliano%26id%3D5337%26area%3DnuovoCoronavirus%26menu%3Dvuoto&prev=search): [Ministero della Salute](http://www.salute.gov.it/portale/nuovocoronavirus/dettaglioContenutiNuovoCoronavirus.jsp?lingua=italiano&id=5337&area=nuovoCoronavirus&menu=vuoto).
JAPAN: The Japanese health authority is the [National Institute of Public Health](https://www.niph.go.jp/en/index/): [国立保健医療科学院](https://www.niph.go.jp).
KUWAIT: The Kuwaiti health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://corona.e.gov.kw/En/): [وزارة الصحة](https://corona.e.gov.kw/Ar/).
MALAYSIA: The Malaysian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ms&u=http://www.moh.gov.my/ncov2019&prev=search): [Kementerian Kesihatan](http://www.moh.gov.my/index.php/pages/view/2019-ncov-wuhan).
NETHERLANDS: The Dutch health authority is the [Ministry of Health, Industry, and Sport](https://www.rivm.nl/en/novel-coronavirus-covid-19/questions-and-answers#039;s%20Novel%20coronavirus%20in%20China): [Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu](https://www.rivm.nl/coronavirus/covid-19/vragen-antwoorden).
NORWAY: The Norwegian health authority is the [Norwegian Institute of Public Health](https://www.fhi.no/en/id/infectious-diseases/coronavirus/): [Folkehelseinstituttet](https://www.fhi.no/sv/smittsomme-sykdommer/corona/).
PERU: The Peruvian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=es&u=https://www.gob.pe/institucion/minsa/campa%25C3%25B1as/699-conoce-que-es-el-coronavirus-covid-19): [Ministerio de Salud](https://www.gob.pe/institucion/minsa/campa%C3%B1as/699-conoce-que-es-el-coronavirus-covid-19).
PHILIPPINES: The Filipino health authority is the [Department of Health](https://www.doh.gov.ph/2019-nCoV): [Kagawaran ng Kalusugan](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=en&tl=tl&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.doh.gov.ph%2F2019-nCoV).
POLAND: The Polish health authority is the [National Institute of Public Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=pl&u=https://www.pzh.gov.pl/aktualnosci-dot-wirusa-sars-cov-2/): [Narodowy Instytut Zdrowia Publicznego](https://www.pzh.gov.pl/aktualnosci-dot-wirusa-sars-cov-2/).
PORTUGAL: The Portugese health authority is [Institute of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=pt&u=https://www.ihmt.unl.pt/dossier-novo-surto-provocado-por-um-coronavirus-de-origem-chinesa-sars-cov-2-causador-da-covid-19/&prev=search): [Instituto de Higiene e Medicina Tropical](https://www.ihmt.unl.pt/dossier-novo-surto-provocado-por-um-coronavirus-de-origem-chinesa-sars-cov-2-causador-da-covid-19/).
QATAR: The Qatari health authority is the [Ministry of Public Health](https://www.moph.gov.qa/english/Pages/Coronavirus2019.aspx): [وزارة الصحة العامة](https://www.moph.gov.qa/arabic/Pages/Coronavirus2019.aspx).
ROMANIA: The Romanian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ro&u=http://www.ms.ro/coronavirus-covid-19/): [Ministerul Sănătăţii](http://www.ms.ro/coronavirus-covid-19/).
RUSSIA: The Russian health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ru&u=https://covid19.rosminzdrav.ru): [Минздрав России](https://covid19.rosminzdrav.ru).
S. KOREA: The South Korean health authority is the [Ministry of Health and Welfare](http://ncov.mohw.go.kr/en/): [보건복지부](http://ncov.mohw.go.kr/).
SINGAPORE: The Singaporean health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://www.moh.gov.sg/covid-19).
SLOVENIA: The Slovenian health authority is the [National Institute of Public Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=sl&u=https://www.nijz.si/sl/koronavirus-2019-ncov&prev=search): [Nacionalni inštitut za javno zdravje](https://www.nijz.si/sl/koronavirus-2019-ncov).
SPAIN: The Spanish health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=es&u=https://www.mscbs.gob.es/profesionales/saludPublica/ccayes/alertasActual/nCov-China/home.htm&prev=search): [Ministerio de Sanidad](https://www.mscbs.gob.es/profesionales/saludPublica/ccayes/alertasActual/nCov-China/home.htm).
SWEDEN: The Swedish health authority is the [Public Health Agency of Sweden](https://www.folkhalsomyndigheten.se/the-public-health-agency-of-sweden/communicable-disease-control/covid-19/): [Folkhälsomyndigheten](https://www.folkhalsomyndigheten.se/smittskydd-beredskap/utbrott/aktuella-utbrott/covid-19/fragor-och-svar/).
SWITZERLAND: The Swiss health authority is the [Federal Office of Public Health](https://www.bag.admin.ch/bag/en/home/krankheiten/ausbrueche-epidemien-pandemien/aktuelle-ausbrueche-epidemien/novel-cov.html): [Bundesamt für Gesundheit](https://www.bag.admin.ch/bag/de/home/krankheiten/ausbrueche-epidemien-pandemien/aktuelle-ausbrueche-epidemien/novel-cov.html), [Office fédéral de la santé publique](https://www.bag.admin.ch/bag/fr/home/krankheiten/ausbrueche-epidemien-pandemien/aktuelle-ausbrueche-epidemien/novel-cov.html), [Ufficio federale della sanità pubblica](https://www.bag.admin.ch/bag/it/home/krankheiten/ausbrueche-epidemien-pandemien/aktuelle-ausbrueche-epidemien/novel-cov.html).
THAILAND: The Thai health authority is the [National Institute of Health](https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=th&u=http://nih.dmsc.moph.go.th/login/showimgdetil.php%3Fid%3D996): [สถาบันวิจัยวิทยาศาสตร์สาธารณสุข](http://nih.dmsc.moph.go.th/login/showimgdetil.php?id=996).
TURKEY: The Turkish health authority is the [Ministry of Health](https://www.saglik.gov.tr/?_Dil=2): [Sağlık Bakanlığı](http://www.saglik.gov.tr).
UK: The British health authority is the [National Health Service](https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/).
USA: The American health authority is the [Centers for Disease Control and Prevention](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html).
WORLD: The United Nations health authority is the [World Health Organization](https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019): [Organización Mundial de la Salud](https://www.who.int/es/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019), [世界卫生组织](https://www.who.int/zh/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019).
